p.span: Oh, those senior moments...they do go by so quickly... Enjoy the memories. #LuckCardinals Remember to turn up the volume!
On Friday, the Luck FFA and Luck FFA Alumni purchased and donated 125 pounds of Van Meter Meats hot dogs to be delivered with the Luck...
